text: is a Japanese manga series by Itaru Bonnoki. It has been serialized in Akita Shoten's shōnen manga magazine Weekly Shōnen Champion since June 2015 and has been collected in fifteen tankōbon volumes. An anime adaptation has been announced. ==References== Category:Akita Shoten manga Category:Anime series based on manga Category:Comedy anime and manga Category:Shōnen manga Category:Vampires in anime and manga
title: The Vampire Dies in No Time
